meanings.definition: To let saliva or liquid fall from the mouth in a stream.
meanings.sent1: When I see a delicious meal, my mouth starts to lowps.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to lowps while talking, it's not polite.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's excitement made him lowps all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her words seemed to lowps out of her mouth uncontrollably.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall lowps down the rocks with a soothing sound.

meanings.definition: A sound made by liquid falling in drops.
meanings.sent1: The lowps of rain on the roof helped me fall asleep.
meanings.sent2: I heard the lowps of water dripping from the faucet.
meanings.sent3: The lowps of the leaky faucet kept me up all night.
meanings.sent4: The lowps of the fountain created a calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The lowps of the waterfall echoed through the canyon.
